name: Cartethyia
title: Wandering Knight · Blessed Maiden

recommendedWeapons.desc: Signature weapon. Increases Max HP by 12%, ignores 8% DEF, and amplifies DMG by 20% on targets with Aero Erosion.
Increases ATK and Basic Attack DMG Bonus, great alternative for Basic Attack-heavy playstyle.
Provides ATK and stacking Resonance Skill DMG Bonus through Searing Feather.
Increases Crit Rate and provides Basic Attack DMG Bonus after Liberation and Basic Attacks.
Increases Energy Regen and provides ATK stacks on Resonance Skill cast.
F2P option. Only sword with HP% main stat, directly benefiting Cartethyia's HP-scaling kit.

recommendedEchoSets.desc: Provides virtually guaranteed Crit Rate and Aero DMG Bonus. Best-in-slot for Erosion DPS.
Provides same Aero DMG Bonus without the Crit Rate boost. Good temporary option.
Unconditional Aero DMG Bonus via Intro Skill. Use if you haven't reached Rinascita.

strengths: Premier Aero Erosion DPS — attacks scale off Aero Erosion for massive damage.
Self-sufficient Erosion — applies Aero Erosion herself, reducing reliance on enablers like Ciaccona.
High skill ceiling — mastering Cartethyia and Fleurdelys form combos unlocks immense potential.
Future-proof — only DPS who maximizes both Aero DMG and Aero Erosion DMG buffs.
weaknesses: Limited support roster — scales off HP, so ATK-boosting supports (like Rejuvenating Glow) are less effective.
Hard to buff — no support sets increase HP, relies on Gusts of Welkin buffs.
High Energy Regen requirement — needs 115-120% to comfortably use Liberation each rotation.

synergy.title: Sub DPS
synergy.description: Ciaccona is the quintessential sub-DPS, providing consistent off-field Aero Erosion and multiple Aero DMG buffs. Without Ciaccona, Sanhua offers Basic Attack DMG Amplification and quick rotations, or Aalto can fill the role.

synergy.title: Support / Healer
synergy.description: Chisa provides consistent heals, DEF reduction via Havoc Bane and Outro, and increases max Erosion stacks — slightly outperforming Rover (Aero) with Kumokiri. Rover (Aero) offers healing and a unique Outro that increases Erosion stack limit. Shorekeeper works for Crit/DMG buffs only.

sequences.desc: Gain Zeal on defeating Erosion-afflicted targets. Conviction milestones grant 25% Crit DMG each (up to 4 stacks, 15s).
Casting Liberation increases max Aero Erosion stacks by 3 and inflicts 3 stacks on nearby targets. Basic/Heavy/Dodge/Intro multipliers +50%, Mid-air +200%.
Best stopping point. Fleurdelys attacks now inflict 2 Aero Erosion stacks, reducing reliance on off-field Erosion applicators. Blade of Howling Squall multiplier +100%.
When any team member inflicts a negative status, all Resonators gain 20% All-Attribute DMG Bonus for 20s.
Survive fatal blow with 20% HP shield (10s, 10min CD). Liberation HP cost reduced to 25%.
Blade of Howling Squall raises Erosion to max and no longer removes stacks. Aero Erosion on max-stacked targets triggers Erosion DMG. Fleurdelys DMG +40%.

pullPriority: Cartethyia > Ciaccona > Defier's Thorn (Sig) > S2 > S3 > Woodland Aria

teams.name: Premium Erosion Team
teams.note: Best team. Chisa provides heals, DEF reduction, and increases Erosion stack limit. Ciaccona enables consistent off-field Erosion and Aero DMG buffs.

teams.name: Non-Premium Team
teams.note: Budget team. Sanhua provides Basic ATK DMG Amplification. Rover (Aero) heals and increases Erosion stack limit with Outro. Requires manual Erosion stack management.
